name: perl-file-sharedir

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: File::ShareDir - Locate per-dist and per-module shared files

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-class-inspector
dependencies.description: Get information about a class and its structure

dependent_to.name: perl-plack
dependent_to.description: Perl Superglue for Web frameworks and Web Servers (PSGI toolkit)

dependent_to.name: lcov
dependent_to.description:
LCOV is a graphical front-end for GCC's coverage testing tool gcov. It
collects gcov data for multiple source files and creates HTML pages
containing the source code annotated with coverage information. It also
adds overview pages for easy navigation within the file structure. LCOV
supports statement, function and branch coverage measurement.

dependent_to.name: perl-test-file-sharedir
dependent_to.description: Create a Fake ShareDir for your modules for testing.
